params.account: The address of the account holding the funds
params.spender: The address of the account spending the funds

approve(address,uint256).details: This will overwrite the approval amount for `spender` and is subject to issues noted [here](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-20#approve)

params.rawAmount: The number of tokens that are approved (2^256-1 means infinite)
params.spender: The address of the account which may transfer tokens

returns._0: Whether or not the approval succeeded

params.account: The address of the account to get the balance of

params.rawAmount: The number of tokens to burn

params.account: The address to receive the mint tokens
params.rawAmount: The number of tokens to mint

params.dst: The address of the destination account
params.rawAmount: The number of tokens to transfer

returns._0: Whether or not the transfer succeeded

params.dst: The address of the destination account
params.rawAmount: The number of tokens to transfer
params.src: The address of the source account

returns._0: Whether or not the transfer succeeded

allowance(address,address).notice: Get the number of tokens `spender` is approved to spend on behalf of `account`

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approve `spender` to transfer up to `amount` from `src`

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the number of tokens held by the `account`
